pages.text: It will check any log/mushroom blocks and 'leaves' within its radius, and will then break those blocks randomly.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: $(li)The upgrade can be enchanted with range and speed upgrade to increase it's range and the speed of its chopping wood respectively$(li)The chopper will utilize an axe if it's equipped with an axe$(li)Chopper will utilize the axe enchanment if it's equipped with an axe otherwise it'll use the upgrade enchantments
